<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The threshold is an Optional value, which maps to one of the 3 states:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 0            =&gt; threshold disabled. All emarks will be printed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 positive int =&gt; manual threshold by user. Remarks with hotness exceed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If threshold option is not specified, it is disabled by default.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this field is set, LTO will write input file paths and symbol</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tunable parameters for passes in the default pipelines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a6c489480556941aaffb99ac11d530ceb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pipelinetuningoptions">PipelineTuningOptions</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a6c489480556941aaffb99ac11d530ceb">PTO</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The following callbacks deal with tasks, which normally represent the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// entire optimization and code generation pipeline for what will become a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// single native object file. Each task has a unique identifier between 0 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getMaxTasks()-1, which is supplied to the callback via the Task parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A task represents the entire pipeline for ThinLTO and regular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (non-parallel) LTO, but a parallel code generation task will be split into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// N tasks before code generation, where N is the parallelism level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LTO may decide to stop processing a task at any time, for example if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// module is empty or if a module hook (see below) returns false. For this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reason, the client should not expect to receive exactly getMaxTasks()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// native object files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A module hook may be used by a linker to perform actions during the LTO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// pipeline. For example, a linker may use this function to implement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// -save-temps. If this function returns false, any further processing for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that task is aborted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Module hooks must be thread safe with respect to the linker&#39;s internal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// data structures. A module hook will never be called concurrently from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// multiple threads with the same task ID, or the same module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note that in out-of-process backend scenarios, none of the hooks will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// called for ThinLTO tasks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> = std::function&lt;bool(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Task, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This module hook is called after linking (regular LTO) or loading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (ThinLTO) the module, before modifying it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a496d67358c7f1e3a328e3ba2cda26268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a496d67358c7f1e3a328e3ba2cda26268">PreOptModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This hook is called after promoting any internal functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (ThinLTO-specific).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a929cce8a073bdcefff79d854deedb7ed"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a929cce8a073bdcefff79d854deedb7ed">PostPromoteModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This hook is called after internalizing the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ace0039edf4791c66d2eb99dab50fe8f9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ace0039edf4791c66d2eb99dab50fe8f9">PostInternalizeModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This hook is called after importing from other modules (ThinLTO-specific).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ad5f3c0f8fbd4bf85381e96cc672beb13"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ad5f3c0f8fbd4bf85381e96cc672beb13">PostImportModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This module hook is called after optimization is complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ab380a759b3e8d32fc59b8f88b52fe198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ab380a759b3e8d32fc59b8f88b52fe198">PostOptModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This module hook is called before code generation. It is similar to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PostOptModuleHook, but for parallel code generation it is called after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitting the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ae36f72183fdb505c21cc4ca6bd48a860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ae36f72183fdb505c21cc4ca6bd48a860">PreCodeGenModuleHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A combined index hook is called after all per-module indexes have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// combined (ThinLTO-specific). It can be used to implement -save-temps for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the combined index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this function returns false, any further processing for ThinLTO tasks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is aborted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is called regardless of whether the backend is in-process, although it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is not called from individual backend processes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b">CombinedIndexHookFn</a> = std::function&lt;bool(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulesummaryindex">ModuleSummaryIndex</a> &amp;Index,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;GlobalValue::GUID&gt;</a> &amp;GUIDPreservedSymbols)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a49ab8afb39328f912dd54a942fbdc5c1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b">CombinedIndexHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a49ab8afb39328f912dd54a942fbdc5c1">CombinedIndexHook</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is a convenience function that configures this Config object to write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// temporary files named after the given OutputFileName for each of the LTO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// phases to disk. A client can use this function to implement -save-temps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: Temporary files derived from ThinLTO backends are currently named</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// after the input file name, rather than the output file name, when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// UseInputModulePath is set to true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Specifically, it (1) sets each of the above module hooks and the combined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// index hook to a function that calls the hook function (if any) that was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// present in the appropriate field when the addSaveTemps function was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// called, and writes the module to a bitcode file with a name prefixed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the given output file name, and (2) creates a resolution file whose name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is prefixed by the given output file name and sets ResolutionFile to its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// file handle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SaveTempsArgs can be specified to select which temps to save.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If SaveTempsArgs is not provided, all temps are saved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a4395f06e55f4b727fe0b685074821644">addSaveTemps</a>(std::string OutputFileName,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
